mapper.select: select tool_id, tool_back_id,tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status,src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where tool_id = #{toolId}

select tool_id, tool_back_id,tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status,src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where status = #{0} and tool_type=#{1}

select tool_id, tool_back_id,tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status,src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where tool_back_id = #{toolBackId}

select tool_id, tool_back_id,tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status,src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where tool_name = #{toolName}

select tool_id,tool_back_id, tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status,src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where status = #{status}

select tool_id,tool_back_id, tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where tool_name = #{toolName}

select tool_id,tool_back_id, tool_name, tool_des, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status, status,create_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from commontool_toolmanage where tool_back_id = #{toolBackId}
mapper.insert:
insert into commontool_toolmanage ( tool_id, tool_back_id, tool_name, tool_des, remark, src_file_name, execexe_file_name, setupexe_name, tool_type, tool_code_type, src_download_status, execexe_download_status, setupexe_download_status, status, create_by, create_time, update_time )values( #{toolId}, #{toolBackId}, #{toolName}, #{toolDes}, #{remark}, #{srcFileName}, #{execexeFileName}, #{setupexeName}, #{toolType}, #{toolCodeType}, #{srcDownloadStatus}, #{execexeDownloadStatus}, #{setupexeDownloadStatus}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate(), sysdate()
)
mapper.delete: delete from commontool_toolmanage where tool_id = #{value} and create_type=1

delete from commontool_toolmanage where create_type=1 and tool_id in
#{toolId}
